h301.definition: from {{h251}} and {{h7891}}; brother of (the) singer; Achishar, an Israelite; Ahishar.

h302.definition: from {{h251}} and {{h8602}}; brother of folly; Achithophel, an Israelite; Ahithophel.

h303.definition: from the same root as {{h2459}}; fatness (i.e. fertile); Achlab, a place in Palestine; Ahlab.

h304.definition: the same as {{h305}}; wishful; Achlai, the name of an Israelitess and of an Israelite; Ahlai.

h305.definition: or אַחֲלֵי; prob from {{h253}} and a variation of {{h3863}}; would that!; O that, would God.

h306.definition: perhaps from {{h2492}} (and thus dream-stone); a gem, probably the amethyst; amethyst.

h307.definition: of Persian derivation; Achmetha (i.e. Ecbatana), the summer capital of Persia; Achmetha.

h308.definition: of uncertain derivation; Achasbai, an Israelite; Ahasbai.

h309.definition: a primitive root; to loiter (i.e. be behind); by implication to procrastinate; continue, defer, delay, hinder, be late (slack), stay (there), tarry (longer).

h310.definition: from {{h309}}; properly, the hind part; generally used as an adverb or conjunction, after (in various senses); after (that, -ward), again, at, away from, back (from, -side), behind, beside, by, follow (after, -ing), forasmuch, from, hereafter, hinder end, + out (over) live, + persecute, posterity, pursuing, remnant, seeing, since, thence(-forth), when, with.

h312.definition: from {{h309}}; properly, hinder; generally, next, other, etc.; (an-) other man, following, next, strange.

h313.definition: the same as {{h312}}; Acher, an Israelite; Aher.

h314.definition: or (shortened) אַחֲרֹן; from {{h309}}; hinder; generally, late or last; specifically (as facing the east) western; after (-ward), to come, following, hind(-er, -ermost, -most), last, latter, rereward, ut(ter) most.

h315.definition: from {{h310}} and {{h251}}; after (his) brother; Achrach, an Israelite; Aharah.

h316.definition: from {{h310}} and {{h2426}}; behind (the) intrenchment (i.e. safe); Acharchel, an Israelite; Aharhel,

h318.definition: (Aramaic) or (shortened) אׇחֳרֵן; (Aramaic) from {{h317}}; last; at last.

h319.definition: from {{h310}}; the last or end, hence, the future; also posterity; (last, latter) end (time), hinder (utter) -most, length, posterity, remnant, residue, reward.

h320.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h311}}; the same as {{h319}}; later; latter.

h321.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h311}}; the same as {{h317}}; other; (an-) other.

h323.definition: of Persian derivation; a satrap or governor of a main province (of Persia); lieutenant.

h325.definition: or (shortened) אַחַשְׁרֹשׁ (Esther 10:1); of Persian origin; Achashverosh (i.e. Ahasuerus or Artaxerxes, but in this case Xerxes), the title (rather than name) of a Persian king; Ahasuerus.

h326.definition: probably of Persian derivation; an achastarite (i.e. courier); the designation (rather than name) of an Israelite; Haakashtari (includ. the article).

h327.definition: of Persian origin; a mule; camel.

h328.definition: from an unused root perhaps meaning to move softly; (as a noun) a necromancer (from their soft incantations), (as an adverb) gently; charmer, gently, secret, softly.

h329.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to pierce or make fast; a thorn-tree (especially the buckthorn); Atad, bramble, thorn.

h330.definition: from an unused root (probably meaning to bind); properly, twisted (yarn), i.e. tapestry; fine linen.

h331.definition: a primitive root; to close (the lips or ears); by analology to contract (a window by bevelled jambs); narrow, shut, stop.

h332.definition: a primitive root; to close up; shut.

h333.definition: from {{h332}}; maimed; Ater, the name of three Israelites; Ater.

h334.definition: from {{h332}}; shut up, i.e. impeded (as to the use of the right hand); left-handed.

h335.definition: perhaps from {{h370}}; where? hence how?; how, what, whence, where, whether, which (way).

h336.definition: probably identical with {{h335}} (through the idea of a query); not; island (Job 22:30).

h338.definition: probably identical with {{h337}} (through the idea of a doleful sound); a howler (used only in the plural), i.e. any solitary wild creature; wild beast of the islands.

h339.definition: from {{h183}}; properly, a habitable spot (as desirable); dry land, a coast, an island; country, isle, island.

h340.definition: a primitive root; to hate (as one of an opposite tribe or party); hence to be hostile; be an enemy.

h341.definition: or (fully) אוֹיֵב; active participle of {{h340}}; hating; an adversary; enemy, foe.

h343.definition: from the same as {{h181}} (in the sense of bending down); oppression; by implication misfortune, ruin; calamity, destruction.

h344.definition: perhaps from {{h337}}; the screamer, i.e. a hawk; kite, vulture.

h345.definition: the same as {{h344}}; Ajah, the name of two Israelites; Aiah, Ajah.

h347.definition: from {{h340}}; hated (i.e. persecuted); Ijob, the patriarch famous for his patience; Job.

h348.definition: from {{h336}} and {{h2083}}; Izebel, the wife of king Ahab; Jezebel.

h349.definition: also אֵיכָה ; and אֵיכָכָה ; prolonged from {{h335}}; how? or how!; also where; how, what.

h350.definition: from {{h336}} and {{h3519}}; (there is) no glory, i.e. inglorious; Ikabod, a son of Phineas; I-chabod.

h351.definition: probably a variation for {{h349}}, but not as an interogative; where; where.

h352.definition: from the same as {{h193}}; properly, strength; hence, anything strong; specifically a chief (politically); also a ram (from his strength); a pilaster (as a strong support); an oak or other strong tree; mighty (man), lintel, oak, post, ram, tree.

h354.definition: an intensive form of {{h352}} (in the sense of ram); a stag or male deer; hart.

h355.definition: feminine of {{h354}}; a doe or female deer; hind.

h356.definition: or (shortened) אֵלוֹן ; or אֵילֹן ; from {{h352}}; oak-grove; Elon, the name of a place in Palestine, and also of one Hittite, two Israelites; Elon.

h357.definition: from {{h354}}; deer-field; Ajalon, the name of five places in Palestine; Aijalon, Ajalon.

h358.definition: from {{h356}}, {{h1004}}, and {{h2603}}; oak-grove of (the) house of favor; Elon of Beth-chanan, a place in Palestine; Elon-bethhanan.

h359.definition: or אֵילַת ; from {{h352}}; trees or a grove (i.e. palms); Eloth or Elath, a place on the Red Sea; Elath, Eloth.

h360.definition: feminine of {{h353}}; power; by implication, protection; strength.

h361.definition: or (shortened) אֵלָם ; or (feminine) אֵלַמָּה ; probably from {{h352}}; a pillar-space (or colonnade), i.e. a pale (or portico); arch.

h362.definition: plural of {{h352}}; palm-trees; Elim, a place in the Desert; Elim.

h364.definition: from {{h352}} and {{h6290}}; oak of Paran; El-Paran, a portion of the district of Paran; El-paran.

h365.definition: the same as {{h355}}; a doe; hind, Aijeleth.

h366.definition: from an unused root (meaning to frighten); frightful; terrible.

h367.definition: or (shortened) אֵמָה; from the same as {{h366}}; fright; concrete, an idol (as a bugbear); dread, fear, horror, idol, terrible, terror.

h368.definition: plural of {{h367}}; terrors; Emim, an early Canaanitish (or Maobitish) tribe; Emims.

h369.definition: as if from a primitive root meaning to be nothing or not exist; a nonentity; generally used as a negative particle; else, except, fail, (father-) less, be gone, in(-curable), neither, never, no (where), none, nor, (any, thing), not, nothing, to nought, past, un(-searchable), well-nigh, without. Compare {{h370}}.

h370.definition: probably identical with {{h369}} in the sense of query (compare {{h336}}); where? (only in connection with prepositional prefix, whence); whence, where.

h371.definition: apparently a shortened form of {{h369}}; but (like {{h370}}) an interrogative; is it not?; not.

h372.definition: from {{h336}} and {{h5828}}; helpless; Iezer, an Israelite; Jeezer.

h373.definition: patronymic from {{h372}}; an Iezrite or descendant of Iezer; Jezerite.

h374.definition: or (shortened) אֵפָה ; of Egyptian derivation; an ephah or measure for grain; hence, a measure in general; ephah, (divers) measure(-s).

h375.definition: from {{h335}} and {{h6311}}; what place?; also (of time) when?; or (of means) how?; what manner, where.

h376.definition: contracted for {{h582}} (or perhaps rather from an unused root meaning to be extant); a man as an individual or a male person; often used as an adjunct to a more definite term (and in such cases frequently not expressed in translation); also, another, any (man), a certain,   champion, consent, each, every (one), fellow, (foot-, husband-) man, (good-, great, mighty) man, he, high (degree), him (that is), husband, man(-kind),   none, one, people, person,   steward, what (man) soever, whoso(-ever), worthy. Compare {{h802}}.

h377.definition: denominative from {{h376}}; to be a man, i.e. act in a manly way; show (one) self a man.

h378.definition: from {{h376}} and {{h1322}}; man of shame; Ish-Bosheth, a son of King Saul; Ish-bosheth.

h379.definition: from {{h376}} and {{h1935}}; man of renown; Ishod, an Israelite; Ishod.

h380.definition: diminutive from {{h376}}; the little man of the eye; the pupil or ball; hence, the middle (of night); apple (of the eye), black, obscure.

h381.definition: from {{h376}} and {{h2428}}; man of might; by defective transcription (2 Samuel 23:20) אִישׁ־חַיxlit ʼÎsh-Chay corrected to ʼÎysh-Chay; as if from {{h376}} and {{h2416}}; living man; Ishchail (or Ish-chai), an Israelite; a valiant man.

h382.definition: from {{h376}} and {{h2897}}; man of Tob; Ish-Tob, a place in Palestine; Ish-tob.

h383.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h3426}}; properly, entity; used only as a particle of affirmation, there is; art thou, can, do ye, have, it be, there is (are), × we will not.

h384.definition: perhaps from {{h837}} and {{h410}}; God has arrived; Ithiel, the name of an Israelite, also of a symbolical person; Ithiel.

h385.definition: from {{h339}} and {{h8558}}; coast of the palm-tree; Ithamar, a son of Aaron; Ithamar.

h386.definition: or (shortened) אֵתָן ; from an unused root (meaning to continue); permanence; hence (concrete) permanent; specifically a chieftain; hard, mighty, rough, strength, strong.

h387.definition: the same as {{h386}}; permanent; Ethan, the name of four Israelites; Ethan.

h388.definition: plural of {{h386}}; always with the article; the permanent brooks; Ethanim, the name of a month; Ethanim.

h389.definition: akin to {{h403}}; a particle of affirmation, surely; hence (by limitation) only; also, in any wise, at least, but, certainly, even, howbeit, nevertheless, notwithstanding, only, save, surely, of a surety, truly, verily,   wherefore, yet (but).

h390.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to strengthen; a fortress; Accad, a place in Babylon; Accad.

h391.definition: from {{h3576}}; falsehood; by implication treachery; liar, lie.

h392.definition: from {{h391}}; deceitful (in the sense of a winter-torrent which fails in summer); Akzib, the name of two places in Palestine; Achzib.

h393.definition: from an unused root (apparently meaning to act harshly); violent; by implication deadly; also (in a good sense) brave; cruel, fierce.

h396.definition: feminine from {{h398}}; something eatable, i.e. food; meat.

h397.definition: of uncertain derivation; Akish, a Philistine king; Achish.

h398.definition: a primitive root; to eat (literally or figuratively); × at all, burn up, consume, devour(-er, up), dine, eat(-er, up), feed (with), food, × freely, × in...wise(-deed, plenty), (lay) meat, × quite.

h400.definition: from {{h398}}; food; eating, food, meal(-time), meat, prey, victuals.
